meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>child</kanji> of a <kanji>judge</kanji> is the thing he puts on his judgements. What does he put on his judgments? His <vocabulary>seal</vocabulary>, you know, to make it all official and stuff.
readingMnemonic: 判 is the reading you learned. 子 is the kun'yomi vocab reading, which I bet you know pretty well by now as well. You just have to remember to use it here.
